greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A285703(n) - n = A000203(A064216(n)) - n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[-n + DivisorSigma[1, #] &@ If[n == 1, 1, Apply[Times, FactorInteger[2 n - 1] /. {p_, e_} /; p > 2 :> NextPrime[p, -1]^e]], {n, 95}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 26 2017 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 26 2017
